channel.title: CVE Feed for Honeywell -- PC42t, PC42tp, and PC42d (Common Firmware)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Honeywell -- PC42t, PC42tp, and PC42d (Common Firmware)

item.title: CVE-2024-6620|2024-07-30T14:17:59.561Z -- honeywell -- pc42t%2C%20pc42tp%2C%20and%20pc42d%20%28common%20firmware%29
item.description: Honeywell PC42t, PC42tp, and PC42d Printers, T10.19.020016 to T10.20.060398, contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. A(n) attacker could potentially inject malicious code which may lead to information disclosure, session theft, or client-side request forgery. Honeywell recommends updating to the most recent version of this firmware, PC42 Printer Firmware Version 20.6 T10.20.060398.

item.title: CVE-2024-6620|2024-07-29T20:14:27.666Z -- honeywell -- pc42t%2C%20pc42tp%2C%20and%20pc42d%20%28common%20firmware%29
item.description: Honeywell PC42t, PC42tp, and PC42d Printers, T10.19.020016 to T10.20.060398, contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. A(n) attacker could potentially inject malicious code which may lead to information disclosure, session theft, or client-side request forgery. Honeywell recommends updating to the most recent version of this firmware, PC42 Printer Firmware Version 20.6 T10.20.060398.
